lead_paragraph: Rich Rodriguez may present evidence to try to prove his claim he was fraudulently induced to sign a coaching contract with West Virginia that included a $4 million buyout clause he now refuses to pay. Monongalia County Circuit Judge Robert Stone granted key victories for both sides in a two-hour pretrial hearing. Rodriguez was not present at the hearing. Rodriguez resigned in December after seven seasons with the Mountaineers to take the coaching job at Michigan.
